website_summaries.verdict: Another affordable option for families wanting a 5-shelf organizer to hold clothes and larger items.
pros: Available to purchase in black, brown, or grey
3 mesh pockets for smaller items on each side of organizer
Can be hung from 2 stainless steel hooks
cons: A few customers had issues with the product arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelves that look good too
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shelves - I bought 2 of them when I had to downsize from a walk-in closet to a regular closet (the horrors!). They are sturdy and can hold quite a bit of weight, and I really like the hangers on the top instead of the velcro attachment I've seen on other styles. The only thing keeping me from giving these shelves 5 stars is that the shelves are a little too shallow to hold t-shirts without them hanging over the edge, and I wish they had 1 more shelf at the bottom. However, the mesh pockets on the sides are good for holding scarves or other small items, and I'd still recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Made for More

customer_reviews.title: Accessory mesh pockets wrong side up
customer_reviews.text: The only problem after two days of use are the 3 accessory mesh pockets. They were attached upside down so the pockets open facing down.
customer_reviews.author: mark west

customer_reviews.title: Strong and great
customer_reviews.text: This thing can hold a ton of weight. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Mornings made easy
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome for organizing school aged kids' clothes. 5 shelves for each school day. Now my kids lay out their wardrobe for the week on Sunday. No running around and arguing what to wear in the morning. Plus they put PE sports clothes in on the right day so no more wearing the wrong clothes on PE days. Hats are stuffed in the side pocket in case it's a cold or hot day according to the weather report. The quality is great. Enough space in each slot for a days' worth of clothes (including bulky sweaters) without any sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin'

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast delivery! It is quite sturdy and useful for storing a variety of things. You can store bags, clothing, just about anything. I put all my camis/everyday shirts as well as jeans. It is also an attractive piece! Overall, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this closet organizer for my bedroom closet. I have found myself thoroughly enjoying it. The shelves are very roomy and sturdy. I had expected the bottom of the shelves to be a piece of cloth. I was pleasantly surprised to find that a strong piece of cardboard held the shelves up. I loved the mesh pockets on the side. I put all my scarves and belts in the pockets and they fit perfectly. I will recommend this closet organizer to anyone who is wanting one. I am enjoying it immensely and I will continue to enjoy it. Thank you for selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Holland

customer_reviews.title: Good use of vertical space!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying our family has very limited space in our home. Two of my daughters have to share a closet. I ordered this for my 7-year daughter's side. All her clothes fit in 3 of these hanging shelf pieces and she was able to fit other items like a hairbrush in the awesome side pockets. I wouldn't be surprised if this helps her to be a tiny bit more organized. The shelves were very easy to put together and begin using. I bought it in black - its lends a clean and attractive look. I noticed a slight chemical smell either from the product or the packaging, which didn't take too long to dissapate.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful! It's so easy to hang in the closet
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful! It's so easy to hang in the closet. I LOVE how the shelves are sturdy and don't bend! we can put my husbands work jeans on two shelves in the middles and they are perfectly stable. So far this is a great hanging shelf! I recommend for anyone need more space in there closet that doesn't have shelves. It is very sturdy compared to similar products.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCWoods

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: It has five sections and I can sort my clothes in different sections, which is great. It is really to assemble. It hardly takes any effort. When you put clothes in their and the weight add up a little, the bottom of each section would lower a little bit because of weight since the bottom is not metal. It doesn't affect its functionality at all. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Xitong Tan

customer_reviews.title: It's not high-end, but it works
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these - one for my toddler's room and one for mine. It holds what I need it to hold. It's easy to put together and lightweight. It's not going to hold anything heavy, but for socks, undies, baby clothes, hats/scarves/gloves, etc, it works really well. There was a slight smell when I unpacked it, but I just left it in an open closet for a couple days and it went away. Not bad at all, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Room game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: Since Covid hit, like many people, I am redoing my home. I needed extra storage to move some clothes and things around and this hanger hit the nail on the head!! I love the color. The side nets are great for hidden adult fun things. :) I love this so much I bought a second one and changed up a room even more. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Seamripper

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of hanging closet organizer like this one. Good and bad. But to add some difficulty, I wanted a cool grey one. Not a grey that is actually brown (like I've seen). I'm very happy with my purshase. I bought one for my husband and one for me. For him, it holds a few tee shirts, under layers and a hat. They're easy to access and avoid a messy closet. Mine are yet to be filled. I'm waiting to put my spring clothes, small purses and hats. i also bought the shoe organizer and for now I put my favorite underwear, socks. I'm going to add my sunglasses, scarfs, my favorite necklaces. Everything but shoes. :-D
customer_reviews.author: sandrine

customer_reviews.title: Great item for nursing home patients
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed yet. Bought two, for my mom and aunt who are in a nursing home. I think this will greatly help organize their limited closet space, and it will be easier to take shirts and pants out of the cubes than off of hangers. I have had similar items in my closet, and found that the one with a wire frame at the top (which this has) is much sturdier. I had one that was reinforced with cardboard, and the hangers pulled through it, ruining it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for the kids closet!
customer_reviews.text: We have tons of stuffed animals and misc things that the kids love, but don't play with too often. We didn't want to drill into our walls, so a stuffed animal net was out, and we didn't want to stuff the toys into a bean bag because we were looking to reduce room. So this was perfect! It holds probably about 20-30 stuffed animals (most are medium-small size) and the side pockets hold our kids drawings and other small flat items. It seems to hold up well, although we didn't put too much weight on it. Color is great and size is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: The product has a really really bad smell, like sweat. I sprayed it with Lysol and let it air out for three days and it still smells. It made my closet smell too. If it wasn't for that, I would really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I first received it. After having it for a few months it starts to sag pretty quickly and all I put in it is t-shirts
customer_reviews.author: Derek Dauma and Brianne Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased shelves like this in the past and have been disappointed in how flimsy the shelves are but not with this one! The shelves are strong and I think will last a long time! I was looking for some extra folding space and this space saving organizer has been just right! I also love the extra pockets on the sides that has allowed me to organize my closet even more. Great product and the company even reached out to me after the purchase telling me about the 5 year warranty that it has!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better price
customer_reviews.text: The shelves cleaned up the closets nicely. I purchased the shoe caddy and the 5 shelf models. My neices, 13, and 11 were able to install them immediately on their own. The 8 year old needed a little help. They were able to place tennis shoes and dress shoes about women's size 8 easily on the shoe caddy. Boots did not fit. The other shelf easily supported several pairs of jeans and a couple over sized shirts/sweatshirts. The girls have been using them a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Open Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old drawer set. Am using it to hold purses, scarves, gloves, etc. Keeps everything nicely organized and visible so you can easily find what you are looking for without having to dig thru closed drawers. Shelves are sturdy and roomy. Wouldn't put anything heavy in it but it is certainly sturdy enough for shoes, sweaters or other clothing items.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: This product serves it's purpose. I bought it for my son's shorts and pants, to keep things organized without having to buy a bigger dresser. It fits many pairs of shorts and pants, it has side pockets for other random storage (we don't really use those). We've only been using this product for a couple months. I'm satisfied with the product and the quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: three_terrible_terriers

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This hanging organizer is as advertised and fair price. Nice sturdy shelves and side mesh pockets. Similar to other hanging shelves there is a gap between the back of this and my closet wall. That’s fine if you want to hide things behind this shelving (away from a curious toddler) but a slight waste of space otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Alyss

customer_reviews.title: WHITE ONE SMELLS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a white one and a gray one for our camper closets. The gray one was fine but the white one smelt like straight butt! I aired it out for two days outside and sprayed it with febreze... Did not help. I could smell it through the closet door and it made me want to barf. Don’t buy the white one whatever you do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SECOND TIME PURCHASING! IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write reviews but since I purchased this item a second time, i figured it deserved an honorary review. This product is absolutely fabulous not complaints at all. It is sturdy, the metal hooks to hang the organizer onto your closet rod is what makes this item so much more than expected. I purchased this for my daughter's apartment in which she had to share her closet and it served its purpose just right. I would highly recommend this item to a friend and all others. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: zainab

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson I saw a program where you put Monday through Friday and they pack their clothes and each shelf for the week so when they get up in the morning they are ready for school this is working out great I am glad I saw this on TV and now he has no trouble getting dressed in the morning
customer_reviews.author: mariemcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Good solution to keeping things tidy
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of random items that I struggle to store because they aren't things I use frequently. I really enjoy the option of this hanging organizer because it allows me to keep things tidy without taking up too much space in my closet. There are also small pockets on the sides to keep smaller items which are helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: I love this hanging shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this hanging shelf! First off, it seems to be a lot sturdier than similar shelves that I have gotten in the past. Second, I LOVE that it has metal hangers that you hang from your closet bar instead of the velcro that most of the hanging shelves come with. Those kind are always so difficult to put up, and this one is easy and sturdy. The pockets on the side are an added bonus. I use it to store all my bras and panties.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful to organize my closet.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to organize my closet and clothes a lot better and its working really well. it holds way more than I thought it did with all the side pockets and with hw deep the actual shelves are, i have two shelves with shoes I dont wear as often and the bottom 3 are like light, smaller blankets I have rolled up and jackets I dont wear that much. Really helps my room look less cluttered!
customer_reviews.author: MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don't over Pack and it's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my pantry since there is more rod than a shelf. It's great for storing stuff but the two holes above started opening due to the weight, which was probably about 3 pasta boxes and cereals. I just limited the weight and left the heavier stuff to the few shelves that I do have. One great thing is the side pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Functional item
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to make my closet more organized without spending a lot on shelving. I live in a small apartment, so maximizing use of space without cluttering is important. I purchased two of these for folded clothing, towels, and bed linens. I like to fold and roll these items into cylinders too, which allows me to put more on these shelves. They also hold up wonderfully due to the sturdy reinforcers and brilliant hanging hook design. Would definitely recommend for its purpose in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric

customer_reviews.title: Multi functional and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I’ve bought. The first two were for my granddaughter’s games and puzzles. This one is for towels etc. in our RV. The side pockets are great! They are sturdy and hold coloring books and markers, or travel size toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lasher

customer_reviews.title: Lets me sleep in 😴💤
customer_reviews.text: Work five days a week? Five compartments to set out your clothes ahead of time. I work at a school and dress casual. I do laundry on weekends, check the ten day weather forecast, and set out my clothes for the week in this terrific hanging sorter. Saves me lots of time in the morning! And this one has much more room and is more sturdy than others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: rona.

customer_reviews.title: A nice closet addition...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to organize my closet. It is working out. The only reason for 4 stars is because the metal frame for the top of the item bent slightly as I was hanging it from the weight of the shelves. The shelves are sturdy which l like since others I have purchased have shelves that aren't as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cohen

customer_reviews.title: .  good product
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, a scaredy cat and a Maine Coon. The scaredy cat walked right to and laid down the coon has found ways to not walk on it. He will have to figure it out because it will be by the litter boxes soon. It did have a smell but I put it outside in the sun and overnight it is gone!
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Kneeland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I can finally fit all my clothes into my closet. This is big enough to fit several pants on a shelf, and works well with the organization boxes I also got off Amazon. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitecrow

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose we hand in mind for storing sheets and bedding supplies. Easy to assemble and fit well in our closet. Not for many heavy items but more than adequate for sheets and light blankets. We are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, like the side pockets
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job and works good for my three-year-old closet, but we tried it for a lot heavier things and it ripped just after a couple of hours. Definitely not high-quality but good for just close or light weight things in the closet. I love the side pockets
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Study
customer_reviews.text: This closet organizer was just what I was looking for. I had previously purchased a similar organizer from Target but the shelves in that one weren't solid, so it sagged. This organizer stands up the the weight of the clothes put in.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Shelf is holding on pretty great so far without looking like its going to fall apart. Wanted something to organize my clothes in my closet and this is exactly what I was looking for! Very easy to assemble and quality is great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nam

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I didn't think of this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a dresser, but I have a huge closet. Finally dawned on me to find a hanging organizer like this, plus shelf dividers, and suddenly? My closet doesn't look like a laundry hamper pile anymore haha Plus my dog has a space for his shirts, everyone wins.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, quality product. I used this in my bathroom for extra space, worked out great. I hung it on a shower rod I put over my sink. The unit fits exactly the spot right next to my sink. It worked out great. I have enough room for a laundry basket underneath it. Give me very useful space I did not have on my sink or under it even.
customer_reviews.author: Nana In Florida

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Great for baby clothes! I'm sure other items too!! I want to buy more for my big kids closets too. Just cant afford it quite yet , but certainly plan on future purchases and highly recommend this organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Beretta

customer_reviews.title: shoes off the floor
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer.. put it in the coat closet and it keeps our shoes organized and off the floor. I am able to store items under it. One of my favorite purchases... I love being organized.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Solved my storage problems
customer_reviews.text: I can now fit all of my clothes in one medium sized closet. Two of these for foldables, though now I'm doing the Kondo method and rolling everything that doesn't need to be on a hanger. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage using minimal space.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and it is sturdier than others. I use it for storage of bath towels, beach towels , paper towels and toilet paper in our one bedroom condo down the shore. The vertical storage saves a lot of space. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy F

customer_reviews.title: A useful, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Sturdy, useful -- it let me get all that stuff up off the closet floor. It happens to be one shelf too long for the space it's in right now, but it neatly "scrunched up" from the bottom to fit the space. A good buy. P.S.: I recently bought another one and handed it to my husband with a brief but unambiguous request. After a few days his closet -- if not exactly a thing of beauty -- has at least started looking human.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Add a closet of storage with this small/sturdy shelving
customer_reviews.text: This added shelving to my small trailer closet— instead of hanging 6 shirts/jackets — this gives me lots of space for shirts/pants/shorts/lots of room- deep enough to hold layers of clothes
customer_reviews.author: Debbiemadison

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the product in overall. The only thing is that for some reason this smells bad. I have no idea why. It's been some time I have it now and the smell should had been gone. But no.
customer_reviews.author: Malvina Veliu

customer_reviews.title: SIZE & Quality a must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very sturdy compared to other brands I've owned. Pretty decent size too. I seen people complain about not being able to fit shoes side by size without them rubbing. I wear a size 12 Men's. They fit perfect with room to spare on each side of the shoe. Now they do poke out maybe an inch or two front ways. But hey, if you bought this for your shoes like me, PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Mikey P

customer_reviews.title: Closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: This storage organizer works ok for my needs. I store leggings in here according to color; doesn't seem to be exceptionally sturdy but don't need it to be for leggings. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Radar

customer_reviews.title: Does a closet proud.
customer_reviews.text: Real Deal, no thin lightweight junk....it's very adequate....it will hold lots of weighty items, so check your closet rod's strength,
customer_reviews.author: Wynn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to do. If you have shorts or lounge pants, I reccomended rolling them abd stacking them in the cube rather than folding. I got several pairs in by rolling.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my purses. I would rather have them standing upright rather than handing them and ruining their strap. I was a little hesitant about this organizer at first because I was afraid it would be too flimsy to have a good hold for all my purses, but it’s actually amazing!!!!! I’m so shocked at tbe weight it can hold without buckling. I would totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Instant extra storage space!
customer_reviews.text: Great hanging shelves. Very useful to add additional space for storing folding items. I have limited closet space and did not want to lose any of my hanging space to use these shelves. Fortunately, I have a metal ceiling. Using strong magnets, I hung my shelves from the ceiling to turn unused/unusable space into extra storage! The shelves are sturdy, with a wire frame giving them shape at the top and a solid insert at the bottom of each shelf to keep it rigid (I think it's a cardboard insert, but not sure). Very happy with these shelves!
customer_reviews.author: Fbx_Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love this for storing clothes in a closet. My dresser isn't big enough so I hang this in the closet to store more clothes and it works well. Have had a few months and it hasn't broke so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory McBride

customer_reviews.title: Gives you such quality!
customer_reviews.text: Was so surprised with this product. It was a great price, so as thought it may be a little cheaply made. I was so wrong!!! It is a great addition to my closet and for the linen closet. So much so, I’m ordering another for my husband! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and it is convenient for small space. Though i was expecting a little larger size. The compartments are really tiny compared to the one i have from ikea. I would say half of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids closets
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is perfect for the shortys in the house that cant reach all their clothes yet. It holds a lot of stuff and so far seems sturdy with no sagging anywhere
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much I think I'm buying a second one. The first one is for my fiancee who has about a billion sets of underwear and two billion socks. This holds them all very nicely and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeroyn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic space saver.
customer_reviews.text: Big storage in a small space. Was able to clear up space and be more organized. I’m actually able to store all my clothes in this unit. Just have my jackets and coats not in this. The side pockets are so useful for my small items of clothing. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Cynthia’s Fire

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my closet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my closet. It's great for all of the little things you have no real place for (side mesh pockets). Also good for ok r sweaters and or shirs you don't want to hang up. Also, it's made well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Obsessed With Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have one similar to this one, and I can see why this one was a little more expensive, a lot more sturdier and a lot more space, comes with pockets on the side, definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Monica Canjura

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to store guest towels in a closet next to my guest bathroom. It’s perfect! I will store a few pool towels in there as well. Excellent space saver!!
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spot for often worn sweaters!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this was to get up and filled. My bulkier sweaters were getting misshaped hanging and I had to room in my dresser - this worked out so great.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: These seem awesome. I bought 4 of these & on day ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem awesome. I bought 4 of these & on day 2 one of them ripped at the top. I tried to exchange it but it only let me return it so I just kept it and will probably have to replace it down the road. I'm hoping I just got that one lemon. They are sturdy and I like that they hold shape in each compartment and don't sag. I'll add more stars if the others hold up and it turns out I really just had one defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: A nice storage option
customer_reviews.text: A really nice size for my small apartment closet. I’m able to fit about 2-3 sweaters per shelf and there seems to be no strain or issue with the weight of it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I want but it smells
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and easy to put together but it smells terrible. I have it sitting in my garage hoping that I can air the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: They are fantastic and very well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband and I. They are fantastic and very well made for the price! I love that it they have side pockets for me to place things in and the cubes and rather deep as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Not super sturdy but lots of storage.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold quite a bit but it’s pretty wobbly and doesn’t seem super sturdy. It was the perfect fit for my closet and I love that it makes me be a little more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to put it up in my closet. I immediately folded my sweaters and put them in my new purchase. Very pleased with my new closet organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry3636

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality - wish they were bigger
customer_reviews.text: These are really sturdy but I wish they came a bit bigger with six compartments. Had to go with another product to maximize the storage space in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Hiphopgroovy

customer_reviews.title: Pockets sewn on upside down.
customer_reviews.text: The pockets on the sides were sewn on upside down. I checked to see if I assembled it upside down but the hangers can only be attached one way. It was easy to assemble and does hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Portable storage shelves
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the color gray however I have received a black color storage shelves . Still thinking if I will return and exchange it for the desired color or just keep this one!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa LL

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price/lots of added storage
customer_reviews.text: A well designed and nice looking product. I have taken one star off as the inserts for the organizer are not all that sturdy as they are cardboard and can only hold about 4-5 lbs per cube and space. I was hoping for a stronger and more sturdy product but still a very functional and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s really sturdy, the compartments don’t bend at all but the assembly was hard! It’s a pretty easy concept but getting the hooks through the holes was a mission!
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: Added so much space to a clothes closet
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant way to add shelves in our Airstream closet. Using this created so much room for linens, and clothes. Keeps things organized. The material matches the color theme of our trailer, and is good quality. Hangs well on the hangar rail.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited storage!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's guest bedroom. There is no dresser for us to put clothes in while we're there for an extended trip and this works perfectly for all the unhangable items.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We've downsized and it works perfectly as an extra place to put things like underwear (e.g., stack folder undershirts). We actually got the idea from some friends who use theirs as a place to stack papers instead of a filing cabinet. To each his/her own.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. It’s sturdy because I’ve not been the most gentle with it but it has never once fallen or come undone. Decent sized compartments
customer_reviews.author: Frances Mensah

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy canvas construction and large openings hold a good deal ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little accessory that I purchased to hold office supplies when recently doing some remodeling. Its sturdy canvas construction and large openings hold a good deal of weight, and the dark brown color fits in with almost any color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Not super sturdy, but still a great user of space
customer_reviews.text: Super duper easy to assemble, and really great. A lot more flimsy than I expected so I've not put as many things into it as I thought I would--but it is still very good for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a lot of room but nice
customer_reviews.text: This really takes up a lot of room but it holds a lot of stuff the fabric is on the thin side,But looks clean and fresh in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Donnarose

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations, great condition
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in great condition and meets expectations, very easy set-up. I'm using it in my children's closets to sort their Monday-Friday outfits and it also holds any accessories in the side pockets. I could also see purchasing one for my own closet to hold sweaters and such as it looks well made and could probably hold more weight than what I'm currently using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good for clothes or shoes.  Not for heavy items.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Hangs nice. Helps organize my otherwise untidy closet. Strong enough for me to put a couple pairs of shoes in a section. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The material of this closet organizer feels sturdy and holds a decent amount of clothes. The hooks were easy to install and for this price, it is a smart buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks decent for kids clothes although that’s not what I bought it for I thought I could save some space in my walk in
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for extra closet storage
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty sturdy, a nice height so you can still fit things under it. Good metal hangers on the top and the pockets are perfect for scarves
customer_reviews.author: GINA NIZIOLEK

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by this
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality and lots of space to hold purses -- much less expensive than others that appear similar. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in a closet or outside of a closet on a rack!
customer_reviews.text: I love my organizer shelves. They look great, are very Saturday, and spacious. The side pockets also come in handy for holding small things I use often.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Space efficiency
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I use this as purse organizer and like it. If you need it to be more versatile I would recommend the ones with bins.
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: Organizer Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Just had this organizer for a few weeks. The organizer fits a good amount of clothing. I’m not sure how sturdy it will be, because the material seems a bit light.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is long overdue, but I bought 2 of these hanging closet organizers and they have been soooo perfect. I didn't want to get bulky furniture pieces for my walk-in closet, so I opted for this alternative. They proved to be a great decision because I had less to transport when I moved recently. They are great for clothes and the pockets on the sides are useful for the small things like socks and gloves.
customer_reviews.author: thebonafidestar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Clothing Organizer
customer_reviews.text: For a student like me, I think it's important to find clothes for everyday use and also find them quickly. So this is a perfect product, tops/blouses can be arranged in one section, trousers and jeans in another section and other things according to your convenience. Very light weight too!
customer_reviews.author: Nidhi

customer_reviews.title: Buy this very helpful storage container!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and convenient to hang in closet. Compartments are roomy and can hold a multitude of things such as socks, bras, underwear, pjs, shirts, shorts etc Really helped with storing of clothes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Durack

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This hanging closet organizer is fantastic! What I really like about it is that the shelf dividers are very sturdy and do not sag!
customer_reviews.author: Patti S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great size
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and exactly as described. I use it for small board and card games in an extra closet. It's sturdy without being bulky. The side pockets have a strong elastic to keep them closed. It's not meant for very heavy items, but perfect for lighter items. I will be ordering this again for other organization needs!
customer_reviews.author: Random person

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of them and the work great so much room and storage space.... I highly recommend!!! And looks so nice I love the black with the white lining
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Missing hangers
customer_reviews.text: Would have been pretty nice, if it had come with the hangers. As is, I can only use it by using two of my own clothes hangers or some string, but that would put more stress on the fabric near the holes. Hopefully the replacement will actually have the hangers. Edit: Replacement shipped very fast. Unfortunately, it also did not come with hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for closet organization!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with organizing my closet to help optimize the limited storage space in have in current home. I am so happy with the quality of the product that I have recommended the item to several friends who were also looking to help optimize their storage space. Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: LKneip

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright so far. But I honestly wish I had sprung for a better one. I personally just need something slightly bigger
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Was sent the wrong color (gray, not black) and didn't feel like going through the motions with customer service and sending it back. Otherwise it adds some very well needed organization to my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenay

product_meta.title: ZOBER 5-Shelf Hanging Closet Organizer - 6 Side Mesh Pockets Breathable Polypropylene Hanging Shelves - for Clothes Storage and Accessories, 12" x 11 ½" x 42" (Black)
feature_bullets: 5-shelf space-saving fabric hanging organizer with 6 mesh pockets and metal hooks provides roomy, open access for daily items. Ideal for homes, dorms, and storage areas. Durable construction and sturdy frame keep items organized and decluttered.
Slim, open-concept hanging closet shelves help save space in closets by making it easy to store, display, and organize clothing, shoes, linens, and accessories in one easy-to-access place.

Made of breathable polypropylene, the hanging shelf organizer is wrapped around a sturdy metal frame and high-quality, thick-grade cardboard for structure. Stitch-reinforced seams and trim add durability.
Hanging closet shelves feature 6 accessory mesh pockets—3 on each side— of the hanging closet for storing smaller such as small bags, socks, slippers, ties, belts, beanies, jewelry.

2 stainless-steel hanging hooks for standard garment rods. Hanging closet storage dimensions: 42" tall x 12" wide, shelves dimensions: 8.5” long x 12” wide x 11.5” deep, pockets: 6 ½” x 10 ½ “, can be stretched to 5 ½” deep. - Weight Limit 15lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,334 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
